trans-unit.source: Provides a base class for all workflow message filters.
trans-unit.target: Fornece uma classe base para todos os filtros de mensagem de fluxo de trabalho.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] The workflow designer provides a `Strategy` design pattern to create replaceable message filter objects to handle events.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]O estruturador de fluxo de trabalho fornece uma `Strategy` padrão de conceção para criar objetos de filtro de mensagem substituível em para processar eventos.

trans-unit.source: Derive from the WorkflowDesignerMessageFilter class to create message filters that can respond to workflow designer events, such as drag operations, layout and paint operations, and other designer events.
trans-unit.target: Deriva da classe de WorkflowDesignerMessageFilter para criar filtros de mensagem que podem responder a eventos de estruturador de fluxo de trabalho, tais como operações de arrastar, as operações de esquema e paint e outros eventos estruturador.

trans-unit.source: To add a custom message filter to the message filters chain, call the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView.AddDesignerMessageFilter%2A> on the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView> or override the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.IWorkflowRootDesigner.MessageFilters%2A> virtual property on the custom root activity and add the custom message filter to the collection returned from the base class.
trans-unit.target: Para adicionar um filtro de mensagem personalizada para a cadeia de filtros de mensagem, chame <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView.AddDesignerMessageFilter%2A>no <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView>ou substituir a <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.IWorkflowRootDesigner.MessageFilters%2A>propriedade virtual personalizado atividade de raiz e adicionar o filtro de mensagem personalizada na coleção devolvido de classe base.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.IWorkflowRootDesigner.MessageFilters%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView> </xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView.AddDesignerMessageFilter%2A>

trans-unit.source: When implemented in a derived class, initializes an instance of a <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowDesignerMessageFilter"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Quando implementada numa classe derivada, inicializa uma instância de um <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowDesignerMessageFilter"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Releases the resources used by the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowDesignerMessageFilter"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Liberta os recursos utilizados pelo <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowDesignerMessageFilter"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowDesignerMessageFilter"></xref> and optionally releases the managed resources.
trans-unit.target: Liberta os recursos não geridos utilizados pelo <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowDesignerMessageFilter"> </xref> e opcionalmente liberta os recursos geridos.

trans-unit.source: This method is called by the public `Dispose()` method and the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowDesignerMessageFilter.Finalize%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Este método é denominado pelo público `Dispose()` método e o <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowDesignerMessageFilter.Finalize%2A>método.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowDesignerMessageFilter.Finalize%2A>

trans-unit.source: `Dispose()` invokes the protected `Dispose(Boolean)` method with the `disposing` parameter set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: `Dispose()`invoca protegida `Dispose(Boolean)` método com o `disposing` parâmetro definido como `true`.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowDesignerMessageFilter.Finalize%2A> invokes `Dispose` with disposing set to `false`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowDesignerMessageFilter.Finalize%2A>invoca `Dispose` com disposing definido como `false`.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowDesignerMessageFilter.Finalize%2A>

trans-unit.source: When the `disposing` parameter is `true`, this method releases all resources held by any managed objects that this <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowDesignerMessageFilter> references.
trans-unit.target: Quando o `disposing` parâmetro é `true`, este método versões retidos por quaisquer objetos geridos de todos os recursos que este <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowDesignerMessageFilter>referências.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowDesignerMessageFilter>

trans-unit.source: This method invokes the `Dispose()` method of each referenced object.
trans-unit.target: Este método invoca o `Dispose()` método de cada objeto referenciado.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > `Dispose` can be called multiple times by other objects.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > `Dispose` pode ser chamado várias vezes por outros objetos.

trans-unit.source: When overriding `Dispose(Boolean)`, be careful not to reference objects that have been previously disposed of in an earlier call to `Dispose`.
trans-unit.target: Ao substituir `Dispose(Boolean)`, não tenha o cuidado para referenciar objetos que tem sido eliminados anteriormente numa chamada anterior para `Dispose`.

trans-unit.source: [!INCLUDE[crabout](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] how to implement `Dispose(Boolean)`, see [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[crabout](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]como implementar `Dispose(Boolean)`, consulte [implementar um método eliminar](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: [!INCLUDE[crdefault](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] `Dispose` and `Finalize`, see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) and [Overriding the Finalize Method](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/8026cb68-fe93-43fc-96c1-c09ad7d64cd3).
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[crdefault](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]`Dispose` e `Finalize`, consulte [recursos não geridos limpeza](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) e [a substituir o método Finalize](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/8026cb68-fe93-43fc-96c1-c09ad7d64cd3).

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to release both managed and unmanaged resources; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> to release only unmanaged resources.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Para libertar recursos geridos e; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> para libertar recursos apenas não geridos.

trans-unit.source: Attempts to free resources by calling <xref uid="langword_csharp_Dispose(false)" name="Dispose(false)" href=""></xref> before the object is reclaimed by garbage collection.
trans-unit.target: Se tentar libertar recursos chamando <xref uid="langword_csharp_Dispose(false)" name="Dispose(false)" href=""> </xref> antes do objeto é recuperado através da recolha de lixo.

trans-unit.source: This method cleans up resources by calling `Dispose(false)`.
trans-unit.target: Este método limpa recursos chamando `Dispose(false)`.

trans-unit.source: Override `Dispose(Boolean)` to customize the cleanup.
trans-unit.target: Substituir `Dispose(Boolean)` para personalizar a limpeza.

trans-unit.source: Initializes the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowDesignerMessageFilter"></xref> with the associated <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa a <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowDesignerMessageFilter"> </xref> associada com <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: You can associate message filters with the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView> to capture messages that occur from user interaction, such as mouse events, keyboard events, paint and layout events.
trans-unit.target: Pode associar os filtros de mensagem com o <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView>para capturar as mensagens que ocorrem da interação do utilizador, tais como eventos do rato, eventos de teclado, paint e esquema de eventos.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView"></xref> to associate with the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowDesignerMessageFilter"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView"> </xref> para associar o <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowDesignerMessageFilter"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.HitTestInfo"></xref> that describes the context of the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowDesignerMessageFilter"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.HitTestInfo"> </xref> que descreve o contexto do <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowDesignerMessageFilter"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.HitTestInfo> contains information about the area and the context of the area hit, including any designers hit and the area on the designer hit.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.HitTestInfo>contém informações sobre a área e o contexto de acessos de área, incluindo quaisquer acessos designers e a área de acessos do estruturador.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.HitTestInfo>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.HitTestInfo"></xref> object that contains information about the context of the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowDesignerMessageFilter"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.HitTestInfo"> </xref> objeto que contém informações sobre o contexto do <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowDesignerMessageFilter"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the mouse button is released above an object during a drag operation.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando o botão do rato é libertado acima um objecto durante uma operação de arrastamento.

trans-unit.source: OnDragDrop occurs when the mouse button is released above an object during a drag operation.
trans-unit.target: OnDragDrop ocorre quando o botão do rato é libertado acima um objecto durante uma operação de arrastamento.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DragEventArgs"></xref> that contains information about the event.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DragEventArgs"> </xref> que contém informações sobre o evento.

trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se a mensagem é processada; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the mouse pointer enters the bounds of an object during a drag operation.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando o ponteiro do rato entra os limites de um objecto durante uma operação de arrastamento.

trans-unit.target: OnDragEnter ocorre quando o ponteiro do rato entra os limites de um objecto durante uma operação de arrastamento.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the mouse pointer leaves the bounds of an object during a drag operation.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando o ponteiro do rato deixa os limites de um objecto durante uma operação de arrastamento.

trans-unit.source: OnDragLeave occurs when the mouse pointer leaves the bounds of an object during a drag operation.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the mouse pointer moves within the bounds of an object during a drag operation.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando o ponteiro do rato se move dentro dos limites de um objecto durante uma operação de arrastamento.

trans-unit.source: OnDragOver occurs when the mouse pointer moves within the bounds of an object during a drag operation.
trans-unit.target: OnDragOver ocorre quando o ponteiro do rato se move dentro dos limites de um objecto durante uma operação de arrastamento.

trans-unit.source: Occurs during a drag operation.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre durante uma operação de arrastamento.

trans-unit.source: OnGiveFeedback occurs when a drag operation is started.
trans-unit.target: OnGiveFeedback ocorre quando é iniciada uma operação de arrastamento.

trans-unit.source: OnGiveFeedback allows the source of a drag operation to modify the appearance of the mouse pointer to give you visual feedback during a drag operation.
trans-unit.target: OnGiveFeedback permite que a origem de uma operação de arrastamento para modificar o aspecto do ponteiro do rato para lhe fornecer comentários visual durante uma operação de arrastamento.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.GiveFeedbackEventArgs"></xref> that contains information about the event.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.GiveFeedbackEventArgs"> </xref> que contém informações sobre o evento.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a key is pressed.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando uma tecla é premida.

trans-unit.source: OnKeyDown occurs when a key is pressed when a specific object has focus.
trans-unit.target: OnKeyDown ocorre quando uma tecla é premida quando um objeto específico tem foco.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.KeyEventArgs"></xref> that contains information about the event.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.KeyEventArgs"> </xref> que contém informações sobre o evento.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a key is released.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando uma tecla é premida.

trans-unit.source: OnKeyUp occurs when a key is released when a specific object has focus.
trans-unit.target: OnKeyUp ocorre quando uma tecla é premida quando um objeto específico tem foco.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.KeyEventArgs"></xref> that contains information about the event.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.KeyEventArgs"> </xref> que contém informações sobre o evento.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when child objects should be repositioned.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando devem ser reposicionados objetos subordinados.

trans-unit.source: OnLayout occurs when child objects should be repositioned within the parent container.
trans-unit.target: OnLayout ocorre quando devem ser reposicionados objetos subordinados no contentor principal.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.LayoutEventArgs"></xref> that contains information about the event.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.LayoutEventArgs"> </xref> que contém informações sobre o evento.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the items selected by dragging the mouse changes.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando os itens selecionados, arrastando as alterações de rato.

trans-unit.source: OnMouseCaptureChanged occurs when the items selected by dragging the mouse changes.
trans-unit.target: OnMouseCaptureChanged ocorre quando os itens selecionados, arrastando as alterações de rato.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when you double-click the mouse.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando faz duplo clique o rato.

trans-unit.source: OnMouseDoubleClick occurs when you double-click the mouse.
trans-unit.target: OnMouseDoubleClick ocorre quando faz duplo clique o rato.

trans-unit.source: The double-click is determined by the mouse settings of the operating system.
trans-unit.target: O faça duplo clique é determinado pelas definições de rato do sistema operativo.

trans-unit.source: You can set the time between clicks of a mouse button that is considered a double-click rather than two clicks.
trans-unit.target: Pode definir o tempo entre cliques de um botão do rato que é considerado um duplo clique em vez de dois cliques.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.MouseEventArgs"></xref> that contains information about the event.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.MouseEventArgs"> </xref> que contém informações sobre o evento.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the message is handled; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se a mensagem é processada; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a paint message is received.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando é recebida uma mensagem de paint.

trans-unit.source: OnPaint occurs when a paint message is received.
trans-unit.target: OnPaint ocorre quando é recebida uma mensagem de paint.

trans-unit.source: Use the parameters passed to OnPaint to determine the area to be painted, the theme used, and additional information about the event passed in the `PaintEventArgs`.
trans-unit.target: Utilize os parâmetros transmitidos para OnPaint para determinar a área de ser pintado o tema utilizado, e informações adicionais sobre o evento transmitido a `PaintEventArgs`.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs"></xref> that contains information about the event.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs"> </xref> que contém informações sobre o evento.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref> that describes the area to be painted.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"> </xref> que descreve a área de ser desenhado.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.AmbientTheme"></xref> used to obtain information about the theme.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.AmbientTheme"> </xref> utilizado para obter informações sobre o tema.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the message is handled; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se a mensagem é processada; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the workflow should repaint its adornments.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando o fluxo de trabalho deve repaint respetivos adornments.

trans-unit.source: `OnPaintWorkflowAdornments` occurs when the workflow should repaint its adornments.
trans-unit.target: `OnPaintWorkflowAdornments`ocorre quando o fluxo de trabalho deve repaint respetivos adornments.

trans-unit.source: A <xref uid="langword_csharp_PaintEventArgs" name="PaintEventArgs" href=""></xref> that contains information about the event.
trans-unit.target: A <xref uid="langword_csharp_PaintEventArgs" name="PaintEventArgs" href=""> </xref> que contém informações sobre o evento.

trans-unit.source: A <xref uid="langword_csharp_Rectangle" name="Rectangle" href=""></xref> that describes the area to be painted.
trans-unit.target: A <xref uid="langword_csharp_Rectangle" name="Rectangle" href=""> </xref> que descreve a área de ser desenhado.

trans-unit.source: An <xref uid="langword_csharp_AmbientTheme" name="AmbientTheme" href=""></xref> used to obtain information about the theme.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref uid="langword_csharp_AmbientTheme" name="AmbientTheme" href=""> </xref> utilizado para obter informações sobre o tema.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the message is handled; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se a mensagem é processada; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Occurs during a drag operation.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre durante uma operação de arrastamento.

trans-unit.source: `OnQueryContinueDrag` occurs during a drag operation.
trans-unit.target: `OnQueryContinueDrag`ocorre durante uma operação de arrastamento.

trans-unit.source: The `OnQueryContinueDrag` event allows the drag source to determine whether the drag operation should be canceled.
trans-unit.target: O `OnQueryContinueDrag` eventos permite que a origem de arrastar determinar se a operação de arrastamento deverá ser cancelada.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.QueryContinueDragEventArgs"></xref> that contains information about the event.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.QueryContinueDragEventArgs"> </xref> que contém informações sobre o evento.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the message is handled; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se a mensagem é processada; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a user scrolls in a workflow designer.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando um utilizador desloca no estruturador de fluxo de trabalho.

trans-unit.source: OnScroll occurs when you use a scroll bar on a designer to scroll up, down, left, or right.
trans-unit.target: OnScroll ocorre quando utiliza uma barra de deslocamento no designer de deslocar para baixo, cópias de segurança, à esquerda, ou com o botão direito.

trans-unit.source: Unless overridden in a derived class, OnScroll always returns `false`.
trans-unit.target: A menos que substituída numa classe derivada, OnScroll sempre devolve `false`.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ScrollBar"></xref> that the user scrolled.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ScrollBar"> </xref> que o utilizador do deslocamento.

trans-unit.source: The position of the scroll bar.
trans-unit.target: A posição da barra de deslocamento.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the message is handled; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se a mensagem é processada; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the workflow should show a context menu.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando o fluxo de trabalho deve apresentar um menu de contexto.

trans-unit.source: OnShowContextMenu occurs when the workflow should show a context menu.
trans-unit.target: OnShowContextMenu ocorre quando o fluxo de trabalho deve apresentar um menu de contexto.

trans-unit.source: The point at which to the context menu is shown.
trans-unit.target: O ponto no qual o menu de contexto é apresentado.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the message is handled; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se a mensagem é processada; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the theme of the workflow changes.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando o tema do fluxo de trabalho é alterado.

trans-unit.source: OnThemeChange occurs when you make changes to the workflow theme.
trans-unit.target: OnThemeChange ocorre quando se fazem alterações para o tema do fluxo de trabalho.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView"></xref> that is associated with the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowDesignerMessageFilter"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView"> </xref> que se encontra associado a <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowDesignerMessageFilter"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: A message filter responds to events in a <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView>.
trans-unit.target: Um filtro de mensagem responde para eventos em <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView>.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView>

trans-unit.source: The message filter is associated with a <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView> using <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView.AddDesignerMessageFilter%2A>.
trans-unit.target: O filtro de mensagem está associado a uma <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView>utilização <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView.AddDesignerMessageFilter%2A>.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView.AddDesignerMessageFilter%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView>

trans-unit.source: When an event occurs in the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView> it passes the message on to the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowDesignerMessageFilter> to be handled.
trans-unit.target: Quando ocorre um evento no <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView>tenha sido enviado a mensagem para o <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowDesignerMessageFilter>deve ser processada.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowDesignerMessageFilter> </xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView"></xref> associated with the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowDesignerMessageFilter"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView"> </xref> associados a <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowDesignerMessageFilter"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a raw Win32 message must be processed.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando uma mensagem de Win32 não processada tem de ser processada.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView> can receive raw Win32 messages from the operating system.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView>pode receber mensagens de Win32 não processadas do sistema operativo.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView>

trans-unit.source: Messages forward to the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowDesignerMessageFilter> to be handled.
trans-unit.target: Mensagens de reencaminham para o <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowDesignerMessageFilter>deve ser processada.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowDesignerMessageFilter>

trans-unit.source: The <xref uid="langword_csharp_Message" name="Message" href=""></xref> to handle.
trans-unit.target: O <xref uid="langword_csharp_Message" name="Message" href=""> </xref> para processar.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the message is handled; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se a mensagem é processada; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.
